Key Match Events: Senegal scored a penalty after Sadio Mane was brought down in the 18-yard box by Burundian defender Nsabiyumva Frederic
Post-Match Reflections: Burundian coach Nda Yiragije Etienne expressed confidence in his team's resilience and fighting spirit despite the loss
Senegal's coach Aliou Cisse acknowledged the team's struggle but highlighted the importance of the three points earned
